title: String solutions with non-constant scalar fields
abstract: We discuss charged string solutions of the effective equations of D=4 heterotic string theory with non-constant dilaton and modulus fields. The effective action contains a generic moduli-dependent coupling function in the gauge field kinetic term and a non-perturbative scalar potential. This is a review of hep-th/9307123 by M. Cvetic and the author. To be published in the Proceedings of 27-th International Symposium on Theory of Elementary Particles, Wendisch - Rietz, September 1993.
